summary: I've never been a fan of Rayya's vanilla look.  Time for a change.
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes Rayya's race and looks to more suit my personal tastes. I got tired of looking at her damn head wrap and was never a fan of the shaved head look. Now she's an attractive dunmer with a full head of hair. Nothing else was changed, and I did the Thane quest twice with no hiccups or problems. If you like this mod, please endorse.

Requirements:
ApachiiSkyHair - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?
ApachiiSkyhair for females v1.3 - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/download/1000010750
The Eyes of Beauty - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722

Recommended: (to look like the screenshots)
CBBE female body replacer - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666
Better females by Bella - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2812 (no makeup version)

Installation:
Use NMM or simply drop the .esp and the meshes and textures folders into the data folder, yes to overwrite. It's that simple.

Uninstallation:
Use NMM or
-delete the .esp
-delete 00005215.NIF from meshes/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceGeom/Hearthfire.esm folder
-delete 00005215.dds from textures/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceTint/Hearthfire.esm folder

Conflicts:
If you're using UFO (Ultimate Follower Overhaul - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037), make sure this mod is loaded AFTER UFO, or you'll get the discolored vanilla head bug.

Thanks to the Nexus modding community, you guys make it possible to enjoy playing the same games over and over and over...

Special Thanks to FalmerBane. After using many of his beautifully done replacers, it inspired me to make some of my own.
author: DDey
